title: Foreigners Rebuff ‘Sell America’ and Buy a Net $1.6 Trillion in Assets
description: Foreign purchases of US financial assets accelerated in 2025, led by demand for stocks and US Treasuries, data on Wednesday showed — marking a sharp rebuttal of the “Sell America” narrative that’s become a regular feature of discussion among market participants.
